sentence.Network_en: It was still dark when five coaches started to ferry the miners the 140 miles from the Silverhill colliery.
sentence.Network_cn: 天还黑着，就有5辆大巴开始从距银山煤矿140英里的地方出发运送矿工。

sentence.Network_en: Last night, a colliery was attacked by a gang of men.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天晚上, 一座煤矿被一伙人给攻击了.

sentence.Network_en: Behind last week's disaster are a catalogue of crimes by colliery managers.
sentence.Network_cn: 上周的灾难背后是一个由煤矿经理所犯的罪宗.
